iface.title: Interface
iface.description: The ethernet interface to capture on

bpf.title: Filter Expression
bpf.description: tcpdump compatible filter expression for limiting the traffic examined (with BPF). Example: "port 53"

host_spec.title: Host Specification
host_spec.description: Subnets (comma separated) to consider this HOST, in CIDR form. Example: "10.0.1.0/24,10.0.2.1/32,2001:db8::/64"

pcap_source.title: Packet Capture Engine
pcap_source.description: pcap backend engine to use. Defaults to best for platform.
